description.value: Once rolled into a ball, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.dUYsJ3BQ9C4ie6cX]{bolidas} can knock down or push aside their foes. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.3d5rETsYFvWg649S]{defensive ball graft} augmentation to take advantage of this augmentation. While curled into a defensive ball, you gain the ability to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.Fu5eDR99bGo9WdUU#charge]{charge} without taking the normal penalties to your attack roll or AC, and you gain a +5 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity during your movement. At the end of your movement, you can’t make a normal melee attack, but you can instead attempt either a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{bull rush} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#reposition]{reposition} combat maneuver against your target with a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll. Once you make a rolling charge, you can’t use this ability again until you take a 10-minute rest to regain Stamina Points.

modifiers.name: Rolling Charge Graft
modifiers.notes: You can instead attempt either a bull rush or reposition combat maneuver against your target with a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll.
